name: Butter Chicken
description: Butter chicken is a popular Indian dish made with marinated chicken cooked in a tomato-based sauce with spices and cream.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: Chicken tikka masala is a popular Indian dish made with marinated chicken cooked in a tomato-based sauce with spices and cream.
instructions: Marinate the chicken with yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, red chili powder, turmeric powder, garam masala, and cumin powder. Let it rest for at least 1 hour.
In a pan, melt butter and add tomato puree. Cook for 5-7 minutes until the puree thickens.
Add marinated chicken to the pan and cook for 10-15 minutes until the chicken is cooked through.
Add cream and salt to taste. Cook for 2-3 minutes and serve hot.

name: Aloo Gobi
description: Aloo gobi is a vegetarian Indian dish made with potatoes and cauliflower.
instructions: Heat oil in a pan and add cumin seeds. When they start to splutter, add chopped onions and sauté until they turn golden brown.
Add ginger-garlic paste and cook for a minute.
Add chopped tomatoes and cook until they turn soft.
Add turmeric powder, red chili powder, coriander powder, and cumin powder. Cook for a minute.
Add cubed potatoes and cauliflower florets. Mix well.
Add salt to taste and 1/2 cup of water. Mix well.
Cover and cook for 10-15 minutes until the vegetables are cooked through.
Garnish with coriander leaves and serve hot.

name: Lobster Butter Masala
description: Lobster butter masala is a seafood version of the popular butter chicken dish. The lobster is cooked in a creamy tomato-based sauce with spices and butter.
ingredients: 1 lb lobster meat, cooked and shelled
instructions: In a pan, melt butter and add ginger-garlic paste. Cook for a minute.
Add tomato puree and cook for 5-7 minutes until the puree thickens.
Add red chili powder, turmeric powder, garam masala, and cumin powder. Cook for a minute.
Add cooked lobster meat and salt to taste. Cook for 2-3 minutes.
Add cream and cook for another 2-3 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or naan.

name: Chicken Korma
description: Chicken korma is a rich, creamy Indian dish made with marinated chicken cooked in a fragrant sauce with yogurt, cream, and spices.
instructions: Marinate the chicken with yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, red chili powder, turmeric powder, garam masala, and cumin powder. Let it rest for at least 1 hour.
In a pan, heat ghee and add chopped onions. Sauté until they turn golden brown.
Add tomato puree and cook for 5-7 minutes until the puree thickens.
Add marinated chicken to the pan and cook for 10-15 minutes until the chicken is cooked through.
Add cream and salt to taste. Cook for 2-3 minutes and serve hot.

name: Spherified Olives
description: Spherified olives are a signature dish at Gaggan. The dish consists of small olives that have been turned into small, liquid-filled spheres using a technique called spherification.
instructions: Make a solution of water and sodium alginate. Mix well and let it rest for 30 minutes.
Purée the green olives and add them to the solution. Mix well.
Fill a syringe with the olive mixture.
Make a solution of water and calcium chloride.
Slowly release the olive mixture from the syringe into the calcium chloride solution. The olive mixture will form small, liquid-filled spheres.
Let the spheres rest in the calcium chloride solution for 3-4 minutes. Rinse with water and serve.
